mapper.insert: insert into pg_stats (schemaname, tablename, attname, inherited, null_frac, avg_width, n_distinct, most_common_vals, most_common_freqs, histogram_bounds, correlation, most_common_elems, most_common_elem_freqs, elem_count_histogram) values (#{schemaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inherited,jdbcType=BIT}, #{nullFrac,jdbcType=REAL}, #{avgWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nDistinct,jdbcType=REAL}, #{mostCommonVals,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{mostCommonFreqs,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{histogramBounds,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{correlation,jdbcType=REAL}, #{mostCommonElems,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{mostCommonElemFreqs,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{elemCountHistogram,jdbcType=ARRAY})
mapper.select: select schemaname, tablename, attname, inherited, null_frac, avg_width, n_distinct, most_common_vals, most_common_freqs, histogram_bounds, correlation, most_common_elems, most_common_elem_freqs, elem_count_histogram from pg_stats
